recipesJson.name: MF Grape
recipesJson.author: Skywxp3d
recipesJson.description: Ever walk down an aley and find a Concord grape bush, grab some grapes and suck out the middle just to spit out the bitter shell? Somehow Japanese gum nails this flavor, and after a 10 day steep this recipe nails that experience! It's super tart yet aromatic, just like a box of Japanese grape gum!
